documents.document: @HLB33 yeah ok, sounded like you were questioning reason to March, so I told you
@HLB33 like it or not, words have consequences too. Words created every oppressive movement in history #sexism #racsim #pussygrab #trump

Why would you act/speak in complete opposition to your beliefs? https://t.co/z9kf2jpVZS
@HLB33 however you spin it, bragging about grabbing pussy is not 'banter'
@HLB33 did I say we should? I didn't say we should prosecute Trump for is words, just that it's ok for people to be against him
@HLB33 do you know what prejudice means? It's not prejudice if the judgement is based on actual words spoken by that person
@HLB33 if bill Cosby is on tape bragging about grabbing pussy what would your thoughts on his potential guilt be?
@HLB33 or an outwardly racist white cop is only a problem to you once he's shot a member of your family
@HLB33 so vile intentions are only a problem once it's too late? Like Hitler was only a problem after the holocaust? Before then he was fine
@HLB33 also I believe Trump has been accused of sexual assault which would hardly be a surprise would it? Considering his comment
@HLB33 you can't be serious. Are you suggesting someone's attitude against groups of people mean absolutely nothing?
If he bragged about being in a position to take advantage of black people would you be ok with it? https://t.co/dhExdU7BId
@HLB33 in fact that might be the silliest thing anyone's ever said to me..
@HLB33 lol that's not really the point though is it?
@HLB33 you can have 'rights' on paper but that doesn't mean people don't violate them and get away with it #brockturner
@HLB33 yeah, pretty sure it's already illegal to grab pussy as you please. DOesnt stop the Donald loving it and his supporters forgiving it
@HLB33 yeah and just like slashing people's health insurance it, as usual, puts the most vulnerable at risk
@HLB33 @TheloniousFilth it's not all about laws and legislation. It's about someone propping up immoral attitudes towards women
Please explain this, if you wouldn't mind. Most confusing thing I've read today #berniesanders https://t.co/6pamuPUIOU

@RoyalMail 4 packages I've ordered over the last month have all gone missing.

@RoyalMail thanks I will chase up with them, I just find it very strange that 3 separate deliveries ordered at the same time are all missing
@RoyalMail you have no idea what's causing a 2 week delay? None at all?
@RoyalMail AW241281650GB that's one from an Amazon seller. Additional info here https://t.co/SHoFKNSL0N

#Trump supporters I think it's time to stop talking about Hilary and time to be upfront about what you believe in
@realDonaldTrump someone's very upset about rudeness/bullying all of a sudden. Shall we reflect on your own name calling etc?
@ezy06001 you're being dumb now. 'Are you against gay marriage?' Trump: 'I'm traditional' ...clever way of not technically saying no
@ezy06001 yeah...true #grabembythepussy
@ezy06001 if he were genuine he wouldn't answer with 'I'm traditional' and avoid further discussion, sometimes lack of comment says more
@ezy06001 no...not media messages, exactly what I've observed of trump in interviews. What he says and what questions he avoids
@ezy06001 you know that presumably or you wouldn't have all those opinions about Hilary
@ezy06001 If you need a direct explicit quote as proof of someones intentions then you're kinda screwed.
@ezy06001 @YouTube Its not always about the specifics of what Trump has/hasn't said, its about the implications of what he's putting across
@ezy06001 @YouTube He basically wants people to have the ability to appose gay marriage if they want to, thats not quite pro LGBT
@ezy06001 @YouTube When asked about gay marriage he says he's 'traditional'. In other words he is an old fashioned christian homophobe
@ezy06001 @YouTube clearly says he's against gay marriage https://t.co/YdA1z7wDcB
@ezy06001 I...DON'T...CARE...ABOUT..HILARY..FUCKING..CLINTON!!OK???!!!!!!!
@ezy06001 @YouTube stop outright denying everything fucking terrible trump has ever said. You are disgusting for doing it
@ezy06001 @YouTube yes he did
@ezy06001 @YouTube gays for trump is as dumb as saying 'bombs for peace' ..he talked about reversing the gay marriage bill
@ezy06001 I get you but bad example. Ice cream has nothing to do with a persons ideologies, but voting for someone is entirely about that
@ezy06001 nobody wants racist politicians? That's a lie. Racists want racist politicians. There's plenty of openly racist people around
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent I've said like 3 times this conversation is not about Hilary
@ezy06001 I don't know how relevant that is tbh, the fact that his win has white nationalists rejoicing, racism on the increase is telling
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent that doesn't mean jack shit. Thats like saying 'im not racist I have black friends' yawn
@ezy06001 bigger picture is its still pretty vile to me and regardless of Trumps intentions, his popularity with these people is evident
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent 'endorse' can mean publicly approve of someone, if we're getting into semantics and 'endorse' is the wrong word..fine
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent First vid that comes up is him declaring support for Trump, we tripping up on the meaning of 'endorse'?
@ezy06001 I've heard enough shit come out of Trumps mouth to dislike him anyway, I'm hardly clutching at straws for reasons not to like him
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent I watched the clip already and I know he's valued among the black community but I disagreed with much he said
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent why you talking about Hilary still. Is that the only thing Trump supporters can do?
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent yeah you google it then, I'm not copying and pasting all the links to you lol
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent you're living under a rock. Hate Hilary all you want but stop living in denial about Trump
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent I'm not even disputing that Hilary may have similar connections. Why are you denying Trump has??
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent literally mate there's pages and pages of news results for KKK Donald Trump endorsements, left and right wing sources
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent last time... Don't give two fucks about Hilary
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent it's not s lie. You haven't proved anything wrong you just keep bringing up Hilary
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent KKK aside many bought into Trump for those associations. Like it or not. He appeals to racists
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent it's not just words out of Hilary's mouth that this comes from
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent so links about Hilary are true and multiple ones about trump plus huge support from white nationalists is all fake?
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent @YouTube thanks for the clip but again don't see how it's relevant
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent what's that got to do with anything?
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent it's been reported by many outlets and not successfully disputed to my knowledge. Widely known for a while no?
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent you're talking about Hilary though I didn't ask about her or even mention her.
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent so it's just a complete lie that the KKK endorsed trump and expressed gratitude for his victory?
@ezy06001 @JOMainEvent why are they claiming a trump win is a victory for them then?
When trump says make America great again he can only be referring to a less progressive time, so of course the white vote is strong #trump
@numpty_moan takes one to know one
